content: In order to recapture the Ko, Black now forces White to play elsewhere on the board and, on the next move, repeats the previous attack. And the fight goes on like this, in what is called the battle of Ko.
translations: ita:Per riguadagnare Ko, il Nero ora costringe il Bianco a giocare altrove sul tavolo e, alla mossa successiva, ripete l'att
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
